return_conditions.title: 1. Return Conditions
return_conditions.text: We accept returns within **14 days** from the date of receipt. To be eligible for a return, the item must be in its original condition, without signs of use.

how_to_return.title: 2. How to Process a Return?
steps: Provide your order number and reason for return
Send the item to our warehouse (address will be provided by the operator)

exceptions.title: 3. Exceptions to the Return Policy
list: They have been used and show signs of wear
They belong to the 'personal hygiene' category (e.g., headphones, razors)
They were purchased under a special promotion without the right of return

refunds.title: 4. Refunds
refunds.text: After the item has been inspected, we will process the refund within **5-10 business days**. The funds will be returned via the same payment method used for the order.
details: Refunds are only issued for the product itself.
**Shipping costs are NOT refunded** if the return is initiated by the customer (e.g., wrong color, size, change of mind).
**Shipping costs are refunded ONLY if the item is defective or does not match the order.**

warranty.title: 5. Warranty
warranty.text: The warranty applies only to items covered by the manufacturer's warranty. If the manufacturer provides a warranty, the customer can contact an official service center or the seller. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, consumables, or damage caused by improper use.

contact.text: If you have any questions about returns or warranty, contact us:
